articles.author: Asif Iqbal Shaik
articles.title: RCS texting between Galaxy phones and iPhones could improve soon - SamMobile
articles.description: After years of pressure from Google and the European Union (EU), Apple implemented RCS texting in iPhones. While it has been over a year since RCS landed on iPhones, RCS texting between iPhones and Galaxy smartphones hasn't improved as much as people expected…
articles.content: After years of pressure from Google and the European Union (EU), Apple implemented RCS texting in iPhones. While it has been over a year since RCS landed on iPhones, RCS texting between iPhones and G… [+1202 chars]
